metadata.title: CVE-2015-6658 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Autocomplete system inDrupal 6.x before 6.37 and 7.x before 7.39 allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted URL, related to uploadingfiles.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6658` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.44-1ubuntu1~16.04.0
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.44-1ubuntu1~16.04.0').
